chinese: 这个消息，使英国海军部大为震动。

english: It moves, it vibrates backwards and forwards .
The house vibrates when a train passes .
chinese: 火车经过的时候，房子震动。

english: In june i received a painful shock .
chinese: 我在六月间受到了一次很大的震动。

english: I took your criticism very much to heart .
chinese: 我听到你的批评受到很大震动。
震动造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: His death was a shock to all his friends .
chinese: 他的死对他所有的朋友都是个震动。

english: Every word seemed to stir the heart .
chinese: 每一字都好象震动心弦。

english: She was utterly shattered, and yet composed .
chinese: 她受到很大震动，但没有惊慌失措。
大桥震动了一下，但仍屹立着。

english: No significant stir in the world of science resulted .
chinese: 在科学界没有引起大的震动。

english: The huge lorries shook the foundations of the house .
chinese: 大卡车驶过时，连房基都震动了。

english: The earth was still vibrating, the rails still humming .
chinese: 大地还在震动，轨道还在营营的响。

english: Then suddenly she had a shock that made her heart beat .
chinese: 蓦地里，她大为震动，心也狂跳起来。

english: The largest shakings are almost incomprehensible in scale .
chinese: 一些最强烈的震动可以达到难以置信的规模。
